BossAbilities.name: Authoritative Shriek
BossAbilities.description: activates random mines, causing them to use Mandrashock

BossAbilities.name: Mandrastorm
BossAbilities.description: proximity AoE on boss - get away; minimum potency at 10y

BossAbilities.name: Mandrashock (pachypodium mine adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (25% per stack, 1m)

Notes: The arena is a 3x3 grid of mines (pachypodium mine adds)
Mines activate in rows with the middle always being first. Stand in the third row to activate and move into the first after it explodes.

BossAbilities.name: Offensive Command
BossAbilities.description: orders some adds to use Flame Breath

BossAbilities.name: Order Relay
BossAbilities.description: orders half of the adds to use Flame Breath, followed shortly by the other half

BossAbilities.name: Piercing Laser
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Flame Breath (cloned shield dragon adds)
BossAbilities.description: conal AoE with late telegraph; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

Notes: Offensive Command: summons 3 adds in a Y shape
Stand beside any of the adds
Offensive Command: summons 5 more adds to complete the circle
Stand beside the one tethered add that doesn't have another tether across from it
Order Relay - see note below for safe spots
Stand beside a tethered add that doesn't have another tether across from it
Order Relay - see note below for safe spots

The two sets of 4 adds for Order Relay will each be a group of 3 and a solo add, separated by the solo add for the other set. To dodge the flames, start in front of the second solo add, then move to the first solo add after the first flames are done

BossAbilities.name: Creature of Darkness
BossAbilities.description: spawns adds at the front of the arena that move toward the back, leaving two open spaces

BossAbilities.name: Dark Wyrmtail
BossAbilities.description: wide line AoE down the center of the arena with late telegraph - get OUT. Spawns adds which move from the center to the sides

BossAbilities.name: Dark Wyrmwing
BossAbilities.description: wide line AoEs down both sides of the arena with late telegraph - get IN. Spawns adds which move from each side to the other

BossAbilities.name: Dark Megaflare
BossAbilities.description: four sets of telegraphed circle AoEs covering the arena, leaving random spaces open each time; adds spawn from some of the AoEs after each set, moving toward a random player

BossAbilities.name: Whei Morn
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE, with four additional hits chasing the targeted player - keep moving! Spawns an add moving toward a random player on each hit

BossAbilities.name: Attack (Dark Wanderer adds)
BossAbilities.description: triggered whenever you touch an add

Notes: All damage other than the boss's auto-attack inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

The first two Dark Wyrm actions will be either tail followed by wing or wing followed by tail. Likewise, the 3 tail/wing actions in a single rotation will always be either tail-wing-tail or wing-tail-wing

BossAbilities.name: Twister
BossAbilities.description: spawns a little tornado under you; instant death if you are standing on it, so make sure you're moving as the cast completes

BossAbilities.name: Meracydian Cyclone
BossAbilities.description: many circle AoEs leaving behind tornados that remain until after Turbine; stepping in one deals damage (magic potency 125) and inflicts windburn (magic DoT potency 250, 6s) which cannot be removed with Esuna

BossAbilities.name: Meracydian Squall
BossAbilities.description: four telegraphed circle AoEs on all party members, each a couple seconds apart; make sure to leave a safe path open for Turbine

BossAbilities.name: Turbine
BossAbilities.description: knockback from center

BossAbilities.name: Twisting Dive
BossAbilities.description: boss goes to one end of the arena and charges straight across (line AoE with late telegraph); drops a twister at the same time, so make sure you're moving as the cast completes

Notes: Getting hit by a Cyclone or Squall AoE inflicts vulnerability up (10% per stack, 30s)
The arena has an outer damage ring which inflicts windburn (unique DoT potency 200, 15s, cannot be removed with Esuna) if you step on it
Find the open center-to-edge path for Turbine
Drop two Squall AoEs at the edge (the first one won't land until the third AoE appears)
Move inward, drop the other two Squall AoEs
Move to the center and wait for Turbine

BossAbilities.name: The Dragon's Voice
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed donut AoE - get IN. Only used as part of the Songs and Thunderous Cold / Cold Thunder combos (never used on its own)

BossAbilities.name: The Ram's Voice
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed pointblank AoE - get OUT. Only used as part of the Songs and Thunderous Cold / Cold Thunder combos (never used on its own)

BossAbilities.name: Songs of Ice and Thunder
BossAbilities.description: Ram's Voice followed by Dragon's Voice - get out, then in

BossAbilities.name: Songs of Thunder and Ice
BossAbilities.description: Dragon's Voice followed by Ram's Voice - get in, then out

BossAbilities.name: Leftbreathed Thunder
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed 180 degree AoE to the boss's left

BossAbilities.name: Rightbreathed Cold
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed 180 degree AoE to the boss's right

BossAbilities.name: Thunderous Cold
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed charge AoE with tether, followed by Dragon's Voice, followed by Ram's Voice - get far to reduce charge damage, then get in, then out

BossAbilities.name: Cold Thunder
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed charge AoE with tether, followed by Ram's Voice, followed by Dragon's Voice - get far to reduce charge damage, then get out, then in

BossAbilities.name: Cacophony
BossAbilities.description: spawns an orb that tethers and chases each party member for a short time before stopping and exploding; runs to the middle to cast this

BossAbilities.name: Chaotic Chorus (orb add)
BossAbilities.description: pointblank thunder AoE; used when the orb gets within range of its target or 9 seconds after it starts moving

Notes: Songs of Ice and Thunder OR Thunder and Ice
Songs of Ice and Thunder OR Thunder and Ice
Elements not important for Left/Rightbreathed. For other abilities, pay attention to the order of elements in the ability name - ice/cold is pointblank and thunder is donut

All ice/thunder AoEs deal 900 potency magic damage (~50k to a DPS/healer) and inflict vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m) along with deep freeze (magic DoT potency 150, 6s) or paralysis (15s), uncurable with Esuna
Ram's + Dragon's Voice combo is survivable with steel
Charge tether is potency 2700 when too close, which will one-shot DPS/healers through steel

BossAbilities.name: Octuple Swipe
BossAbilities.description: Eight Bullish Swipe telegraphs followed by the actual attacks

BossAbilities.name: Disorienting Groan
BossAbilities.description: knockback from center

BossAbilities.name: Bullish Swipe
BossAbilities.description: 90 degree conal AoE with late telegraph - get behind; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Bullish Swing
BossAbilities.description: pointblank AoE with late telegraph - get away; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Thundercall
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; leaves several orbs scattered around the room; orbs explode in pointblank AoEs in time with the first hit of Octuple Swipe

Notes: The boss rotates to face the player before Octuple Swipe, so the first swipe will always be toward the player. The first four swipes are in the order front > back > left > right, and the next four are either the same order or reversed
Stand outside of the first spot
The only attack that might repeat in the same area is 4 and 5
If there is no repeat, follow all of the attacks - always stand where the last one hit
If there was a repeat, follow the attacks until the one that repeats. Wait for both hits in that area, then move into it and stay there

BossAbilities.name: Steel Claw
BossAbilities.description: tankbuster

BossAbilities.name: Ferocity
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed charge attack with tether; get far to reduce damage

BossAbilities.name: Preternatural Turn
BossAbilities.description: donut AoE if boss has a big blue glowing animation; pointblank AoE otherwise; late telegraph. Inflicts vulnerability up (10% per stack, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Roar
BossAbilities.description: causes many rocks and crystals to fall from the ceiling causing circle AoEs; 4 crystals are left behind. Crystals do AoEs with late telegraphs with the next Preternatural Turn - see notes below

BossAbilities.name: Shatter (crystal adds)
BossAbilities.description: pointblank AoE (magic damage) if boss has a big blue glowing animation; wide conal AoE (physical damage) otherwise; late telegraph. Inflicts vulnerability up (10% per stack, 30s)

Notes: If the boss is doing a pointblank AoE, the crystals will do wide conal AoEs toward the outside of the arena. The safe spots are between the farthest crystal and an adjacent one, a bit closer to the far one and outside of the pointblank
If the boss is doing a donut AoE, the crystals will do pointblank AoEs. The safe spot is a small triangle just inside the inner circle of the boss's hitbox toward the far crystal
Unei can provide all the heals you need as long as you don't get hit by anything avoidable

BossAbilities.name: Resonance
BossAbilities.description: conal AoE tankbuster

BossAbilities.name: Barofield
BossAbilities.description: creates damage zones in center (instant death) and outer ring (unique DoT potency 200) of arena

BossAbilities.name: Nanospore Jet
BossAbilities.description: inflicts positive or negative charge to each player and spawns four adds outside the arena with positive or negative charge markers; also re-creates the instant death zone in the center of the arena

BossAbilities.name: Auto-cannons (adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoEs across the arena, forming an 'X'; used periodically - see rotation below

BossAbilities.name: Centralized Nerve Gas
BossAbilities.description: wide conal AoE to the front; the boss turns to face the target before using this

BossAbilities.name: Leftward Nerve Gas
BossAbilities.description: 180 degree AoE to the boss's left and behind

BossAbilities.name: Rightward Nerve Gas
BossAbilities.description: 180 degree AoE to the boss's right and behind

BossAbilities.name: Nerve Gas Ring
BossAbilities.description: donut AoE with late telegraph - only a narrow ring around the center is safe; instant death zone in center disappears right after this

Notes: Magnet attract/repel happens just before this cast finishes; there is a quick moment to adjust when the telegraph appears
Auto-cannons fire at the same time
Getting hit by Auto-cannons or any Nerve Gas attack inflicts vulnerability up (10% per stack, 30s)
North and south adds are always negative. West and east adds are always positive
If you are solo, you will always be bound to the north add, which spawns behind the boss
Use steel if you're not confident, so you can easily survive a hit from any of the Nerve Gas abilities

BossAbilities.name: Support Systems
BossAbilities.description: spawns Interceptor adds. α (eggs) will do wide conal AoEs, β (cubes) will do line AoEs, γ (spheres) will do a donut AoE, all with late telegraphs. The timing of these is determined by the boss's next move. See rotation for more details

BossAbilities.name: Interception Sequence
BossAbilities.description: places 1/2/3 markers on the adds to indicate the order they will fire in

BossAbilities.name: Parallel Execution
BossAbilities.description: causes adds in each set to fire one at a time from left to right while 5 consecutive circle AoEs also appear on players

BossAbilities.name: Salvo Script
BossAbilities.description: orders all adds to fire at once

BossAbilities.name: Peripheral Lasers
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed donut AoE

BossAbilities.name: Cross Lasers
BossAbilities.description: cross AoE (lines through front-back and sides) - get to corners (oriented with boss/animation)

BossAbilities.name: Laserstream
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Aetherochemical Laser (adds)
BossAbilities.description: AoE with late telegraph; shape varies with add (see rotation)

Notes: 1 Interceptor α (egg) outside one side of the arena
5 Interceptor β (cubes) in a row along one side of the arena, close to the egg
Interception Sequence - dodge adds in the order of markers
8 Interceptor β (cubes) along the north side of the arena
8 Interceptor β (cubes) along the east side of the arena

Parallel Execution - dodge the circle AoEs while also getting to the safe side of both sets of firing cubes (wait for one to go off and run quickly into that space before the next goes off and hits you)
6 Interceptor β (cubes) along the west side of the arena with spaces beside the first and last at each end
6 Interceptor β (cubes) along the north side of the arena with spaces beside the first and last at each end
1 Interceptor α (egg) on the east side of the arena
1 Interceptor α (egg) on the south side of the arena
Salvo Script - pay attention to the direction the eggs are facing
safe spot is always in the far corner of a single square that is the second from the corner of the arena
if both eggs are facing inward, safe spot is between the two eggs
if one is facing toward the corner between the eggs, safe spot is on the far side of the other egg
Peripheral/Cross Lasers will one-shot DPS/healers through steel
All abilities except Laserstream inflict stacking vulnerability up (10% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Paradoxum
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; grants Soul of Ice or Soul of Fire to each player; if there are Caliburni swords, this imbues one set with fire, and another with ice

BossAbilities.name: Caliburni
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoEs leaving swords that persist outside the arena. After a short time, the swords shoot back across

BossAbilities.name: Thermal Divide
BossAbilities.description: Line and roomwide AoE; One side of the arena will be hit with fire, the other with ice. Stand OUTSIDE of the line telegraph, and on the side opposite of the buff you have. This will change your buff.

BossAbilities.name: Call Dimension Blade
BossAbilities.description: Setup cast - nothing actually happens

BossAbilities.name: Solid Souls' Caliber
BossAbilities.description: pointblank AoE with late telegraph - get out; followed by arc or conal AoEs

BossAbilities.name: Empty Souls' Caliber
BossAbilities.description: donut AoE with late telegraph - get in; followed by arc or conal AoEs

BossAbilities.name: Vacuum Slash
BossAbilities.description: conal AoEs with Solid/Empty Souls' Caliber

BossAbilities.name: Frostforge
BossAbilities.description: indicates Frost's Revelation will happen after next Souls' Caliber, so you'll need to get the fire buff

BossAbilities.name: Flameforge
BossAbilities.description: indicates Flame's Revelation will happen after next Souls' Caliber, so you'll need to get the ice buff

BossAbilities.name: Frost's Revelation
BossAbilities.description: roomwide ice-aspected AoE - must have fire buff; switches your buff to ice

BossAbilities.name: Flame's Revelation
BossAbilities.description: roomwide fire-aspected AoE - must have ice buff; switches your buff to fire

BossAbilities.name: Exglacialis
BossAbilities.description: spawns 2 sets of 3 circle AoEs that turn into star AoEs. Outside the center ring of the arena, there is a pattern with 8 points. Each of these points is a safe spot for all possible patterns

BossAbilities.name: Exflammeus
BossAbilities.description: spawns a series of circles that grow and explode; you can run clockwise around the boss's hitbox to avoid them

BossAbilities.name: Steel Strike (sword adds)
BossAbilities.description: return attack from Caliburni swords (no element)

BossAbilities.name: Steel Flame (sword adds)
BossAbilities.description: return attack from Caliburni swords (fire element)

BossAbilities.name: Steel Frost (sword adds)
BossAbilities.description: return attack from Caliburni swords (ice element)

BossAbilities.name: Ice Bloom (star AoEs)
BossAbilities.description: line AoEs from Exglacialis stars

Notes: Blades from Caliburni fire back across the arena
Paradoxum - one set of blades turns to fire, and another to ice
Frostforge OR Flameforge - you'll need to make sure your buff is opposite of this
Blades from Caliburni fire back across the arena. If you have the same element as the boss prepared, make sure to get hit by an opposite element blade
Frost's OR Flame's Revelation, depending on which was prepared
Soul of Fire/Ice increases damage from the same element to 10x normal, so everything becomes a one-shot

BossAbilities.name: Concussive Oscillation
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Overtow
BossAbilities.description: inflicts knockback; knockback immunity does not work

BossAbilities.name: Amorphous Applause
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed half room AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (40% per stack, max 16 stacks, 45s)

BossAbilities.name: Proboscis
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Psycho Squama
BossAbilities.description: huge telegraphed conal AoE; inflicts confused (10s)

BossAbilities.name: Neuro Squama
BossAbilities.description: 360 degree gaze inflicting confused (10s) - look away!

BossAbilities.name: Fragility (butterfly adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts paralysis (30s)

Notes: Butterflies appear along the perimeter at the same time
Butterflies all explode at the same time, inflicting big damage and paralysis
TLDR: Stay close to centre so everything is easy to dodge

BossAbilities.name: Lightning Strike
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoE

BossAbilities.name: Cloud Call
BossAbilities.description: summons Raiuns (untargetable lightning cloud adds)

BossAbilities.name: Shiko
BossAbilities.description: proximity AoE; knocks players into the air. Potency scales from 1000 on top of the marker to 100 at ~3y distance (1 boss radius) from the marker edge, so as long as you move a little bit away, damage is minimal

BossAbilities.name: Supercell
BossAbilities.description: 180 degree AoE (covers the entire room in front of the boss)

BossAbilities.name: Lightning Bolt (cloud AoE)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m). Vulnerability up is applied even if the damage is fully shielded

Notes: Make sure you're far from the boss and stand under a cloud. You will break the cloud, creating a safe spot, as the other clouds will all do AoEs a moment later - stay in the safe spot until after this
Lightning Strike (wait until cloud AoEs before dodging)
Supercell (wait until cloud AoEs before dodging)

BossAbilities.name: Tornado
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Aero
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoE; inflicts windburn (magic DoT potency 50, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Aero II
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; inflicts windburn (magic DoT potency 50, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Aero III
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts knockback; knockback immunity does not work, but completely blocking the damage with a shield will also block the knockback

BossAbilities.name: Windage (whirlwind adds)
BossAbilities.description: pointblank AoE; inflicts windburn (magic DoT potency 50, 30s)

Notes: Whirlwinds appear along the west and east sides of the arena
Whirlwinds explode immediately after this, so make sure not get get knocked into them
Whirlwinds appear along the north and south sides of the arena

BossAbilities.name: Rusting Claw
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed conal AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Words of Woe
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed line AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (20% per stack, 1m)

BossAbilities.name: Eye of the Fire
BossAbilities.description: 360 degree gaze inflicting confused (20s) - look away

BossAbilities.name: The Spin
BossAbilities.description: proximity AoE - get away (minimum potency at 20y, or about halfway across the room)

BossAbilities.name: Void Spark (orb adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts heavy (30s). Diminishing returns do NOT apply to this heavy (it is always 30s)

Notes: Rusting Claw - he stops and raises a hand to indicate that he's readying this
Words of Woe - he stops, looks at the target, and stands still for a moment before firing this
Orbs appear and boss drops proximity marker. Orbs will do telegraphed pointblank AoEs at regular intervals. Get away from the boss, but also away from the orbs
The Spin - big damage if you're close to the marker, and very little if you're half the room away
Orbs disappear as he does his next Rusting Claw

BossAbilities.name: Firewalker
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE; inflicts knockback

BossAbilities.name: Fire II
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; inflicts burns (magic DoT potency 100, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Topple
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts knockback

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Flare
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Infinite Anguish (staff adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed donut AoE; inflicts bleeding (magic DoT potency 50, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Searing Chain (staff adds)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed line AoE; inflicts bleeding (magic DoT potency 50, 30s)

Notes: First set of 4 Accursed Canes appears
Second set of 4 Accursed Canes appears
Fire II - at the same time, the first group of canes does donut AoEs
Second set of canes does donut AoEs
Topple - At the same time, the first group of canes does line AoEs at random players
Second group of canes does line AoEs
Canes disappear and a new group of 8 appears
All 8 canes do donut AoEs. The centre is always safe from these, and there are safe spots to the outside of each cane
All 8 canes do line AoEs at random players. These are easiest to dodge if you bait them toward the walls
TLDR: Lots of AoEs to dodge

BossAbilities.name: Predator Claws
BossAbilities.description: untelegraphed conal AoE inflicting flesh wound (physical DoT potency 80) - get away or behind

BossAbilities.name: Slabber
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Innerspace
BossAbilities.description: targeted circle AoE; leaves a puddle that inflicts minimum (damage dealt -20%, damage taken +400%). Auto-attacks and Ululation will generally one-shot DPS and healers without steel while in this puddle

BossAbilities.name: Ululation
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Hound out of Hell
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide charge AoE to targeted player; inflicts stun (4s)

BossAbilities.name: Devour
BossAbilities.description: instant death to players WITHOUT minimum debuff (otherwise misses); on hit, absorbs target's remaining HP

Notes: Ululation - stay OUT of puddle until after this
Hound out of Hell - get IN the puddle when this targets you
Devour - stay IN puddle until this, then get OUT
Ululation - make sure you're OUT of puddle
TLDR: Be OUT of puddle for Ululation > IN for Hound out of Hell and Devour > OUT for Ululation
Innerspace targets a random player each round. Hound out of Hell and Devour are used on the same player
If you take no damage from Hound out of Hell, it will not stun you. Make sure not to leave the puddle until AFTER Devour

BossAbilities.name: Heavensward Howl
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE; inflicts deep freeze (magic DoT potency 50, 18s)

BossAbilities.name: Ecliptic Bite
BossAbilities.description: instant gap closer; instant death to players with deep freeze

BossAbilities.name: Lunar Cry
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

Notes: Summons ice chunks that will explode in a large untelegraphed pointblank AoE if hit by the icicle, other exploding chunks, or Lunar Cry
Icicle appears on one side of the arena with telegraphed circle AoE, then does a telegraphed line AoE shooting across the platform

BossAbilities.name: Burning Rave
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Knuckle Press
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts knockback

BossAbilities.name: Aura Cannon
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Quaga
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Meteor Impact
BossAbilities.description: delayed proximity AoE

BossAbilities.name: Subduction (orb adds)
BossAbilities.description: instant pointblank AoE; inflicts heavy (30s) and knockback

Notes: Meteor Impact - drops proximity marker under Onra; several black orbs also spawn around the room and pulse pointblank AoEs that inflict heavy
Burning Rave - meteor drops on proximity marker, and black orbs disappear roughly when this cast starts
Place 3 markers along the wall, using the posts for reference:
C 3 posts north/counter-clockwise from B (just right of the exit)
Do whatever for the first 15% - doesn't really matter.
Before Onra hits 85%, position him so that he's standing on the A marker and facing south
When he starts casting Ancient Quaga, go behind him. This prevents an auto-attack immediately after Ancient Quaga
Wait for Onra to turn around and make one auto-attack. This is important for positioning Meteor Impact
Immediately run just past B. You need to move right after the auto to avoid a black orb AoE. You want Onra to stop on the B marker
Wait for one auto-attack, then run to C, which will get you out of Aura Cannon
Wait for Burning Rave, then move to B
Wait for Knuckle Press, then move Onra back to A facing south
You must touch the Empyrean Shrine at the far end of floor 100 to secure your victory. It takes about 15 seconds to run across the floor without Sprint
You gain the title for soloing once you touch the shrine. To set it for your screenshots while still inside, use this text command: /title set "Lone Hero"

BossAbilities.name: Abyss
BossAbilities.description: instant circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Shackle
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (50%, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Word of Pain
BossAbilities.description: instant roomwide(?) AoE

BossAbilities.name: Doom
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed huge conal AoE; inflicts doom (20s). Doom can be removed with Esuna

BossAbilities.name: Summon Darkness
BossAbilities.description: phase change action; summons corse adds

Notes: phase 1: uses only Abyss until HP reaches 90%
Summon Darkness: spawns 1 Giant Corse and 1 Bicephalic Corse
phase 2: uses Abyss and Shackle until HP reaches 65%
Summon Darkness: spawns 1 Bicephalic Corse and 1 Iron Corse
phase 3: uses Abyss, Shackle, and Word of Pain until HP reaches 40%
Summon Darkness: spawns 1 Iron, 1 Giant, and 1 Bicephalic Corse
phase 4: rotation of Doom > Abyss > Word of Pain > Shackle > Abyss > Word of Pain
Lust can be used to AoE the adds down quickly (3 hits) while also applying vulnerability stacks to the boss
Adds remain on the battlefield when killed, and will be resurrected after a while if not cleared with resolution
Resolution can be used to kill adds in one shot. It can also be used on the corpses to remove them from the battle, preventing them from resurrecting
You'll want to use at least one resolution to clear most, if not all, of the adds. They are likely to overwhelm you otherwise

BossAbilities.name: Whipcrack
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Stormwind
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Bombination
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts slow (12s)

BossAbilities.name: Lumisphere
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Aero Blast
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts windburn (physical DoT potency 50, 15s)

BossAbilities.name: Bloody Caress
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Acid Mist
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts poison (magic DoT potency 150, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Gold Dust
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player; inflicts poison (magic DoT potency 150, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Leafstorm
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Rotten Stench
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

Notes: Boss runs to north end and stays there until after Rotten Stench phase
Two Deep Palace Hornet adds appear
Kill adds quickly, or they will use Final Sting, which does 70% max HP damage (each). This can be outranged, but the adds will keep using it repeatedly until it hits or they die
If you use lust during the second Rotten Stench cast, it will last long enough to kill 2 sets of adds. Steel may be needed to survive long enough on non-tanks though
Rotten Stench will one-shot a DPS or healer without steel

BossAbilities.name: Dissever
BossAbilities.description: instant conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Ball of Fire
BossAbilities.description: instant circle AoE on random player; leaves burn puddle (unique DoT potency 450)

BossAbilities.name: Ball of Ice
BossAbilities.description: instant circle AoE on random player; leaves heavy puddle

BossAbilities.name: Fear Itself
BossAbilities.description: roomwide donut AoE; inflicts hysteria (10s); must be inside/near boss's target circle to avoid

Notes: Boss runs to center of room
Make sure to stay out of middle for the fire/ice balls to keep a safe spot for avoiding Fear Itself
Fear Itself is a quicker cast than on floor 30, so get to the center fast

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Eruption
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; leaves a bleed puddle (unique DoT potency 1300)

BossAbilities.name: Entropic Flame
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

BossAbilities.name: Accursed Pox
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE

BossAbilities.name: Scream
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts terror (10s) and prey

BossAbilities.name: Shadow Flare
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

Notes: Can be killed in under 1 minute on any job using strength and resolution
If adds are still alive at this point, prey will cause them to cast Tornado, killing you with 99999 damage
Bleed pool DoT, Entropic Flame, and (presumably) Accursed Pox will one-shot DPS/healers - stay away

BossAbilities.name: Dark Mist
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts terror (10s)

BossAbilities.name: Void Fire IV
BossAbilities.description: large telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Void Aero
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

BossAbilities.name: Summon Darkness
BossAbilities.description: summons one of four types of adds (see rotation)

BossAbilities.name: Fatal Allure
BossAbilities.description: draws succubus add to boss and inflicts terror on it

BossAbilities.name: Blood Sword
BossAbilities.description: kills succubus add, absorbing its remaining HP

BossAbilities.name: Blood Rain
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; also hits zombie adds. Never crits

BossAbilities.name: Sweet Steel (succubus add)
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Void Fire II (succubus add)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE

Notes: Summon Darkness (Gargoyle): calls an untargetable gargoyle that will use a large telegraphed line AoE at the same time as Dark Mist
Summon Darkness (Zombies): calls 4 zombie adds that will slowly crawl towards you. If one touches you, you will be bound until it dies
Summon Darkness (Vodoriga): calls an untargetable vodoriga that will use a telegraphed circle AoE just after the next Void Fire IV
Summon Darkness (Succubus): calls a succubus add - in addition to autoattacks, uses Sweet Steel and Void Fire II
Blood Sword - the HP drain is 1:1, so whether you DPS the add or the boss doesn't matter in terms of damage
Blood Rain - kills any remaining zombies
Don't let the zombies catch you
Physical ranged jobs can just kite the zombies until they despawn. It's likely better for others to kill them. They have pretty low HP
If you're not killing the succubus add, it's worth putting DoTs on it anyway
In party play, Summon Darkness (Gargoyle/Vodoriga) summons one add for each party member

BossAbilities.name: Geirrothr
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Hall of Sorrow
BossAbilities.description: instant large circle AoE leaving bleed puddle (unique DoT potency 100)

BossAbilities.name: Valfodr
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed charge AoE; inflicts knockback'

Notes: Flames appear around the edges of the arena and do telegraphed pointblank AoEs at the same time. Make sure to get knocked into a safe spot or use knockback immunity. The flames explode a couple seconds after the knockback, so there is a bit of time to adjust. Flame explosions deal 70% max HP damage
Bleed DoT does not stack (standing in overlapping puddles does the same damage as standing in just one)
The flame AoE telegraphs are buggy and sometimes don't display - stay away from the flames even if you don't see the telegraphs

BossAbilities.name: Drench
BossAbilities.description: instant conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Electrogenesis
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Douse
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; leaves behind a puddle which grants damage up (30%) and haste to the boss. Standing in the puddle does NOT hurt you

BossAbilities.name: Fang's End
BossAbilities.description: inflicts heavy (15s)

Notes: Hit Sprint when it uses Drench if you're still heavied to escape Electrogenesis safely. Only needed 1 out of every 5 times because of diminshing returns on the heavy (15s > 7s > 3s > resist > resist > 15s)

If you're kiting, it is a good idea to try to pull the boss to the same place every time for Douse. If they're all stacked in one place, it's much easier to keep the boss out of them, reducing damage taken
If not kiting, simply pull him out of the puddle after Douse

BossAbilities.name: Thunderbolt
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Charybdis
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player that leaves behind a tornado

BossAbilities.name: Trounce
BossAbilities.description: large telegraphed conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Ecliptic Meteor
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; medium cast time

BossAbilities.name: Maelstrom (tornado)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE of double the tornado's size that draws players in

BossAbilities.name: Charybdis (tornado)
BossAbilities.description: used periodically against players inside the tornado

Notes: Trounce; runs to the south end of the arena to cast this
Trounce again, but from the north end
Enters enrage mode at 15% - stands up and casts Ecliptic Meteor, dealing 80% max HP damage to everyone in the party. Continues to cast this over and over until the fight ends
If you are standing in front of him during meteors, he can also autoattack you (so don't do that!)
Most jobs require a very strict strategy to get through this final push. See the job-specific notes below
Useful if you have trouble clicking it off quickly
Again useful if you have trouble cancelling it quickly otherwise
Cancelling food is useful during enrage if you're healing through it because Meteors do damage based on your max HP. Lower max HP means less damage taken, which means less damage to heal
Cancelling your food when not at full HP also acts like a pseudo heal since it lowers your max HP, which actually raises your current HP%
Check boss HP% with decimal place: /echo <thpp>
useful so you can get him as close to 15.0% as possible without accidentally starting the burst phase

BossAbilities.name: Scalding Scolding
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Sap
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Hypothermal Combustion (Giddy Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts deep freeze

BossAbilities.name: Hypothermal Combustion (Remedy Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts deep freeze (DoT potency 15, 5s)

BossAbilities.name: Flashthoom (Grey Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE inflicting stun (2s); also hits enemies, including the boss

BossAbilities.name: Massive Burst
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

Notes: Remedy Bomb (blue) spawns along with several untargetable Giddy Bombs
Remedy Bomb starts using Hypothermal Combustion immediately with a long cast time. It must be killed before this goes off to prevent massive roomwide damage (80% max HP damage + 5s deep freeze)
Giddy Bombs all use Hypothermal Combustion after a few seconds. Theirs is a small telegraphed pointblank AoE with a short cast time, so stay away from them
Lava Bomb (red) spawns along with several Giddy Bombs as the boss starts casting Massive Burst.
Massive Burst will do 99% max HP damage to everyone if it finishes
Lava Bomb does a pointblank AoE that can interrupt the boss's Massive Burst. It can be moved around by attacking it
Giddy Bombs are the same as before, and can get in the way of your attempts to move the Lava Bomb if you're not prepared

Remedy Bomb and Lava Bomb spawn locations are static. Knowing the spawn locations of Lava Bombs is especially useful, as you can then pull the boss to where it will spawn, allowing you to to keep uptime on the boss instead of running around to position the bomb
DO NOT open with lust if soloing, as the cleave at the start will destroy you

The safest time to use lust is during the triple Sap cast. Kill the Remedy Bomb as quickly as possible to maximize your time. DO NOT get greedy here. Drop transfiguration immediately regardless of stacks after the third Sap, as you need to be prepared for the cleave that follows
Another option is to use Lust to kill the Lava Bomb and get stacks on the boss at the same time. It will take 4 hits to kill the Lava Bomb, so don't delay
You must touch the Firecrest or Glass Pumpkin at the far end of floor 200 to secure your victory. It takes about 35 seconds to run across the floor without Sprint
You gain the title for soloing once you touch the ending. To set it for your screenshots while still inside, use this text command: /title set "The Necromancer"

BossAbilities.name: Whipcrack
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Stormwind
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Bombination
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts slow (12s)

BossAbilities.name: Lumisphere
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Aero Blast
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts windburn (physical DoT potency 50, 15s)

BossAbilities.name: Bloody Caress
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Acid Mist
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; inflicts poison (magic DoT potency 75, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Gold Dust
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player; inflicts poison (magic DoT potency 75, 30s)

BossAbilities.name: Leafstorm
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Rotten Stench
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

Notes: Boss runs to north end and stays there until after Rotten Stench phase
Kill adds quickly, or they will use Final Sting, which does 70% max HP damage (each)
Lust can be used to AoE down the adds quickly while continuing to DPS the boss as well

BossAbilities.name: Dissever
BossAbilities.description: instant conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Ball of Fire
BossAbilities.description: instant circle AoE on random player; leaves burn puddle (unique DoT potency 350)

BossAbilities.description: instant circle AoE on random player; leaves heavy puddle

BossAbilities.description: roomwide donut AoE; inflicts hysteria (10s); must be inside/near boss's target circle to avoid

Notes: Boss runs to center of room
Make sure to stay out of middle for the fire/ice balls to keep a safe spot for avoiding Fear Itself

BossAbilities.name: Ancient Eruption
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; leaves a bleed puddle (unique DoT potency 40)

BossAbilities.name: Entropic Flame
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed wide line AoE

BossAbilities.name: Accursed Pox
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE; inflicts disease (30s)

BossAbilities.name: Scream
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; inflicts terror (10s) and prey

BossAbilities.name: Shadow Flare
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

Notes: If adds are still alive at this point, prey will cause them to cast Tornado, likely killing you

BossAbilities.name: Dark Harvest
BossAbilities.description: cleave

BossAbilities.name: In Health
BossAbilities.description: either a huge donut AoE or a large pointblank AoE; pierces Steel and absorbs 100% of damage dealt

BossAbilities.name: In Sickness
BossAbilities.description: instant (possibly circle AoE?); inflicts disease (20s)

BossAbilities.name: Black Honeymoon
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; adds 950 damage (Steel-piercing) for each player who was hit by In Health, or 9500 total damage at 5 In Health hits

BossAbilities.name: Cold Feet
BossAbilities.description: 360 degree gaze AoE; inflicts confused (10s)

Notes: Uses Black Honeymoon once at 90% health
Uses Black Honeymoon once at 60% health
In Health (x2: pointblank > donut OR donut > pointblank)
Summons untargetable adds outside the arena which will cast either a single circle AoE (potency 250) or four line AoEs (each potency 300), resolving shortly before In Health
Avoid the AoEs, then run toward Edda to dodge In Health
Stay close to avoid In Health easily
But be careful of the disease debuff from In Sickness in the first half of the fight
Make sure to turn for Cold Feet

BossAbilities.name: Geirrothr
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Hall of Sorrow
BossAbilities.description: instant large circle AoE leaving bleed puddle (unique DoT potency 70)

BossAbilities.name: Valfodr
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed charge AoE; inflicts knockback'

Notes: Flames appear around the edges of the arena and do telegraphed pointblank AoEs at the same time. Make sure to get knocked into a safe spot or use knockback immunity. The flames explode a couple seconds after the knockback, so there is a bit of time to adjust. Flame explosions deal 70% max HP damage
Bleed DoT does not stack (standing in overlapping puddles does the same damage as standing in just one)
The flame AoE telegraphs are buggy and sometimes don't display - stay away from the flames even if you don't see the telegraphs

BossAbilities.name: Drench
BossAbilities.description: instant conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Electrogenesis
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Douse
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE; leaves behind a puddle which grants haste to the boss. Standing in the puddle does NOT hurt you

BossAbilities.name: Fang's End
BossAbilities.description: inflicts heavy (15s)

Notes: Hit Sprint when it uses Drench if you're still heavied to escape Electrogenesis safely
Make sure to drag the boss out of the Douse puddles

BossAbilities.name: Thunderbolt
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed conal AoE

BossAbilities.name: Charybdis
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player that leaves behind a tornado

BossAbilities.name: Trounce
BossAbilities.description: large telegraphed conal AoE; inflicts vulnerability up (20%, 20s)

BossAbilities.name: Ecliptic Meteor
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE; long cast time

BossAbilities.name: Maelstrom (tornado)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE of double the tornado's size that draws players in

BossAbilities.name: Charybdis (tornado)
BossAbilities.description: used periodically against players inside the tornado; inflicts windburn (magic DoT potency 180, 20s)

Notes: Trounce; runs to the east end of the arena to cast this
Trounce again, but from the west end
At 10% HP, the boss casts Ecliptic Meteor once, then returns to the rotation

BossAbilities.name: Scalding Scolding
BossAbilities.description: instant

BossAbilities.name: Sap
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed circle AoE on random player

BossAbilities.name: Self-destruct (Lava Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE

BossAbilities.name: Burst (Grey Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

BossAbilities.name: Frost Grenade (Grey Bomb)
BossAbilities.description: telegraphed pointblank AoE inflicting stun (2s); also hits enemies, including the boss

BossAbilities.name: Massive Burst
BossAbilities.description: roomwide AoE

Notes: Grey Bomb spawns along with several untargetable Lava Bombs
Grey Bomb starts using Burst immediately with a long cast time. It must be killed before this goes off to prevent big roomwide damage (80% max HP)
Lava Bombs all use Self-destruct after a few seconds. This is a telegraphed pointblank AoE, so don't get caught in the middle of them
Another Grey Bomb, but no Lava Bombs this time
Giddy Bomb spawns along with several Lava Bombs as the boss starts casting Massive Burst
Massive Burst will do 99% max HP damage to everyone if it finishes
Giddy Bomb does a pointblank AoE that can interrupt the boss's Massive Burst. It can be moved around by attacking it
Lava Bombs are the same as before, and can get in the way of your attempts to move the Giddy Bomb if you're not prepared
Grey and Giddy Bomb spawn locations are static. Locations below are relative to the center and listed per rotation (Grey > Grey > Giddy)
You can preposition the boss where Giddy Bomb will spawn to avoid having to move the bomb around
You can preposition the boss on first Grey Bomb and use Lust to AoE it along with the boss for a faster kill
